scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/core && npm run build -w packages/react && npm run build -w packages/vanilla
scripts.demo: npm run build && npm run dev -w demo
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -w packages/core -w packages/react -w packages/vanilla
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -w packages/core -w packages/react -w packages/vanilla
scripts.version:major: npm version major -w packages/core -w packages/react -w packages/vanilla
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test && npm publish -w packages/core --access public && npm publish -w packages/react --access public && npm publish -w packages/vanilla --access public
